doc.title: Beyond the Red Wall: The Persecution of Falun Gong
doc.plot: The story of Kunlun Zhang, an artist and professor at McGill University, who was arrested and jailed for nearly three years in a Chinese labor camp. The film reveals testimony from Zhang and never-before-seen, footage smuggled out of China, re-creating the kind of torture that the Falun Gong movement claims is routine in Chinese prisons.
